title: Where the fuck is our skin
body: Ive been playing on this fucking server since day 1, and we still dont have a skin made for us, yet everyother server has one WHY

replies.body: Riot gave us Pool Party Ziggs for free when you switched from NA to OCE during OCE's early release.
Just give OCE Riot another two or three years, I'm sure they will get around to making it... eventually.

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Tjmm0j2E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-15T03:28:34.325+0000)
>
> Just give OCE Riot another two or three years, I'm sure they will get around to making it... eventually.

OCE employees don't make skins...

wtf what other skins do the other servers have i never noticed

link would be great, i would like to see those server skins

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Tjmm0j2E,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-15T06:28:55.327+0000)
>
> wtf what other skins do the other servers have i never noticed
> 
> link would be great, i would like to see those server skins

russia got the bear sej skin
turkey got sultan trynd
one of the south american servers got ghost bride morgana.

OCE should have Pool Party Ziggs.
I mean, that's what they gave me on my other acc (made around release day).
Ignorance is great, OCE isn't just Australia.
Do you really think Riot gives a shit? Its been five years and the game is still a mess.
because apparently it's too hard to make a skin that's culturally appealing to the diverse cultures of the OCE server or something
